Class MiastaService

java.lang.Object
com.project.springbootjavafx.services.AbstractServices<Miasta,String>
com.project.springbootjavafx.services.MiastaService
@Service public class MiastaService extends AbstractServices<Miasta,String>
The MiastaService class provides service operations for managing cities (represented by the Miasta entity) in the system.

It extends AbstractServices to inherit basic CRUD operations and adds domain-specific functionality, such as verifying the uniqueness of a city before adding it to the database.

The service uses MiastaRepository for data access, ensuring that no duplicate city entries are created.

See Also:

  • Method Details

    • add

      public Miasta add(Miasta miasto) throws DuplicatedEntityExceptionn
      Adds a new city to the database after verifying that it does not already exist.

      This method checks if a city with the same name already exists by using the repository's existsByMiasto method. If a duplicate is found, a DuplicatedEntityExceptionn is thrown. Otherwise, the new Miasta entity is saved and returned.

      Specified by:
      add in class AbstractServices<Miasta,String>
      Parameters:
      miasto - the Miasta entity to be added
      Returns:
      the saved Miasta entity
      Throws:
      DuplicatedEntityExceptionn - if a city with the same name already exists
